sentences.en: From this flower the mind desires to watch sportive play of life.
sentences.cn: 头脑渴望从这朵花上观看生命的游戏.

sentences.en: He did his best, therefore, to achieve a mood half sportive and half thoughtful '.
sentences.cn: 于是他尽其所能培养一种半开玩笑半认真的心情.

sentences.en: However, the present situation in teaching sportive gymnastics is generally unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 然而, 目前我国体育院校艺术体操教学开展,普遍存在着不容乐观的现象.

sentences.en: I know you are very sportive and this I like very my dear.
sentences.cn: 我知道你很强健,这我很喜欢,我亲爱的.

sentences.en: If you are caring, honest, sportive, have ambitions to be sense humor, please contact me.
sentences.cn: 善良体贴, 真诚, 有事业心,珍惜感情,期望有感情归宿, 爱好运动的阳光男人, 请联系我.

sentences.en: Sportive fun with table football, darts , and teams of bowling and football.
sentences.cn: 有桌上足球, 飞镖, 保龄球和足球.

sentences.en: The designs of the sportive product are depending on the people's needs.
sentences.cn: 体育型的产品是根据人们的需求设计开发出来的.

sentences.en: The sportive gymnastics has long since played an important role in China's PE teaching . "
sentences.cn: 长久以来,艺术体操在我国体育院校 教学内容 中占有重要地位.
